text: Voodoo Child may refer to: == Related to Jimi Hendrix == * "Voodoo Child (Slight Return)", a 1968 song by The Jimi Hendrix Experience * "Voodoo Chile", another song by The Jimi Hendrix Experience * Voodoo Child: The Jimi Hendrix Collection, a 2001 album * Voodoo Child: The Illustrated Legend of Jimi Hendrix, a graphic biography illustrated by Bill Sienkiewicz == Other uses == * "Voodoo Child" (Rogue Traders song), a 2005 dance song * Voodoo Child (comics), a comic book from Virgin Comics * Voodoo Child (band), a Rock and Roll band from Guwahati, Assam * "Voodoo Child", a short story by Graham Masterton * Moby (born 1965), or Voodoo Child, electronic musician == See also == * Voodoo (disambiguation)
title: Voodoo Child
